function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Excess algal growth in urban bodies of water","Impact":"Health concerns for children and other individuals due to contact with toxins and algal blooms","Mitigation":"Preventing excess algal growth through nutrient control and water management","Technologies":"Biological control using natural predators, proper construction and pond management","People":"Children, individuals in recreational areas, and visitors","Owner":"Pond managers, construction and design teams"},{"Description":"Risks associated with rodent habitat near ponds due to undisturbed vegetation","Impact":"Increased risk of rodents being attracted to the area and potential contamination of the water","Mitigation":"Proper rodent management procedures and landscape design to prevent rodent habitat","Technologies":"Rodent management techniques, appropriate landscape design","People":"Pond managers, landscape designers, and local authorities","Owner":"Pond managers, landscape designers"},{"Description":"Health risks associated with water toxins and algal blooms","Impact":"Skin rashes, irritation of the nose, eyes, and/or throat from toxins and algal blooms","Mitigation":"Education and awareness about the risks, promoting safe water contact practices","Technologies":"Water treatment and filtration systems, educational materials","People":"Children, individuals in recreational areas, and visitors","Owner":"Local authorities, educational institutions"}]}
